Interface IRankRepository

Repository interface for Rank related CRUD operations.

Namespace: MagicQuizDesktop.Models
Assembly: MagicQuizDesktop.dll
Syntax
public interface IRankRepository

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

GetRanks(String)

Asynchronously retrieves a list of 'Rank' objects from an API.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<List<Rank>>> GetRanks(string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String authToken

The authentication token for the API.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<System.Collections.Generic.List<Rank>>>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation. The task result contains an ApiResponse object that holds the list of 'Rank' objects.

Asynchronously gets the score for a specific user.

Declaration
Task<ApiResponse<Rank>> GetScore(int userId, string authToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 userId

The Id of the user.
System.String authToken

The user's authorization token for authentication and authorization purposes.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<ApiResponse<Rank>>

A Task yielding an ApiResponse of Rank type containing user's score details.

ResetRanks(String)

Resets the ranks by using the specified authentication token.

Type Name Description

The authentication token.
Returns
